thread.title: Urban Meyer racked up $120k using Ohio State private plane for vacation, report says
thread.title_full: Urban Meyer racked up $120k using Ohio State private plane for vacation, report says

author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: Urban Meyer racked up $120k using Ohio State private plane for vacation, report says
text:
February 21, 2017 12:44pm EST February 21, 2017 12:44pm EST Urban Meyer used Ohio State's private planes for family vacations and let the university pick up the pricey tab, according to The Associated Press. Urban Meyer (Getty Images) 
Updated at 12:44 p.m. ET 
Updated at 12:44 p.m. ET 
Urban Meyer used Ohio State's private planes for family vacations and let the university pick up the pricey tab, according to The Associated Press . 
The AP reports that the school, "which leases one plane and partly owns another," allowed the coach and members of his family to use the aircrafts on 11 personal trips last school year, including a vacation to Florida, a weekend in Cape Cod and spring break in South Carolina. 
The report claims the trips cost the university (and likely the students) $120,000. 
MORE: Alabama finds new offensive coordinator on Patriots' coaching staff 
The AP reports that Meyer also used the planes to take 15 recruiting trips during that same period, bumping the cost to more than $350,000. 
The report says the bill for Ohio State's private planes, including fuel and maintenance, totaled $1.6 million last school year. 
Meyer, who declined the AP's request for comment, makes more than $6 million per year, according to USA Today .
